name: The Anti-Chaos Flee
description:
One day the world has fallen into chaos, but the day after the chaos is being clearing up into nothing by a giant red wall!  Let there be more chaos!(because it is better than nothingness) 

wasd - move                      space bar - jump                   tab - look backward

The floating road is crumpling behind you and it is game over when you touch the red wall. Don't fall off, avoid the obstacles, and run as long and far as possible!

But what is worst than  a bad game like this one? It also being performance intensive.
developers: John the game dev and the gamer bundle
